description:
Fufu Tools is a toolbox with a collection of gadgets.


> With several starts(Branches), but just one end(Release)~    

> [!TIP]
> 独立开发工具包仓库 → [DuckDuckStudio/Fufu_Dev_Tools](https://github.com/DuckDuckStudio/Fufu_Dev_Tools)  

## 修改

### 修复
- fix(对比清理): 修复在无法读取目标文件时未处理 UnicodeDecodeError 异常的问题 by @DuckDuckStudio in https://github.com/DuckDuckStudio/Fufu_Tools/pull/252

### 依赖
- build(deps): bump pyside6 from 6.9.3 to 6.10.0 in https://github.com/DuckDuckStudio/Fufu_Tools/pull/252
- CI/CD
  - build(deps): bump softprops/action-gh-release from 2.3.4 to 2.4.0 in https://github.com/DuckDuckStudio/Fufu_Tools/pull/251

本版本版本号为 1.4.2  
首发日期 2025/10/9
